name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a truck driver in Shanxi delivered goods to a certain place. He had to get off the truck to go to the toilet and was asked to be quarantined for seven days. The driver was emotionally broken... It is too difficult for ordinary people to make a living! So I said that sometimes I really feel that the current situation is not that the people are sick, but that the people who are responsible for epidemic prevention have gone crazy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Many Huawei phones encounter "restart gate"
Many netizens found that their Huawei phones suddenly entered the system update page and could not exit. They could not be used without updating, but after the update, the phone restarted every ten minutes. (Why does the phone in the picture look like an Apple)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It has been like this since my childhood.
"There was no depression in our era."
"Just give it a beating and it will be fine."
"Don't tell me these things. If you focus on studying, it won't be like this."
"You just have a good life."
They never really listened to the children's stories, and all they got was humiliation.
When the children jumped off the building or took medicine, they were the ones who hugged the children's bodies at the gate of the compound and cried and shouted "Why are you so stupid?"
But they never thought that they were accomplices.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It's really a lie!

The leader of a Beijing epidemic prevention department criticized the unruly people

"Why are you talking so much nonsense? Just go home when I tell you to... The harmonious society has been going on for too long, and everyone doesn't even know their own last name anymore"

The exact date is unknown

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Located in Xiangmiyuan, Xi'an
It was closed from November 1st to November 7th. It was supposed to be lifted at midnight on the 8th, but the entire enclosed area of the old city received a notice that the time of lifting the blockade was to be determined. Xiangmiyuan was a low-risk area, so the community refused to lift the blockade. People gathered at the gate of the community to defend their rights
The police came and arrested the woman in the video, a man who supported her, and another person. I don't know why. A total of three people were arrested, and they were released within two hours.
